name: Ravager Spawn (Crawler Form)
resistance: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 24

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the Ravager moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 25 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the Ravager can make one claw attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Form-Shifting
traits.desc: The Ravager can physically alter its physiology to take on one of the three listed forms: the crawler, the brawler, or the flier. Doing so takes one minute, and during this period it cannot take any other actions, though it is not considered incapacitated.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.desc: The Ravager’s bite and claws score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/day)
traits.desc: If the Ravager fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Disruption
traits.desc: Every time the Ravager comes into contact with magical effects, there is a chance that it disrupts it. This effect functions as per the dispel magic spell cast using a 5th level spell slot with a +5 spell casting ability modifier.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The Ravager’s melee attacks are magical.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When the Ravager reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the Ravager can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The Ravager regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Ravager takes damage from an artifact or from a legendary action, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the Ravager’s next turn. The Ravager only dies if it starts its turn at 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The Ravager can burrow through solid rock at half of its burrowing speed, leaving a 10 foot-wide, 16-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

traits.name: Vampiric Healing
traits.desc: Whenever the Ravager hits with a melee attack, it regains hit points equal to half the damage it inflicts on its opponent, up to its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Ravager makes one bite and four claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (6d6 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 36 (8d6 + 8) slashing damage.
